Reviews.Title: Locked!
Reviews.Author: Bon vivant
Reviews.Content: This phone was locked when It arrived, totally NOT how it was advertised!  So it is not usable as is!  Bad buy!

Reviews.Title: Was not nunlocked
Reviews.Author: T. G.
Reviews.Content: At time of purchase it was not unlocked!!!!!!!!!.After being unlocked it was very good.Would recommend to someone interested in the hassle of unlocking.

Reviews.Title: Simple Phone for simple use
Reviews.Author: srna
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 66 year-old mother who needs a simple phone to use in an emergency -  she said, "It doesn't  have a camera!?"Who knew!!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone but would not accept my sim card from my old Motorola Razr
Reviews.Author: Bob Stallings
Reviews.Content: All I was looking for was an unlocked phone that would work with my Razr phone because all I am interested in is making & receiving calls - - - none of the other stuff. It was my understanding from my research that this phone was compatible with my old Motorola Razr cell phone. However, when I received it I discovered my sim card was a little too small and would not fit as it should in the slot. I checked the refund policy of Amazon and resigned myself that I was stuck with it. A couple of weeks later I was reading some experiences of others and how well they were treated by Amazon. All I had done was open the package, open the phone, and attempt to install my old sim card. So, I e-mailed Amazon and they were very nice and  understanding. Amazon agreed to accept the phone back and give me a full credit of $39.99. The phone appeared to be "new" and first class for an old "dumb" phone so it is probably a great phone.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: Brian Wong
Reviews.Content: We thought the phone was supposed to be new but it seemed refurbished.It arrived fairly quickly after we ordered it - maybe within the weekThe phone worked with the SIM card we bought at 7-11.The only drawback was that the battery was drained after only about 12 hrs and a few short calls, so we needed to charge it every time we got back to the hotel.Didn't use any of the other features ... we just needed to phone to make reservations and meet up with friends

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: The phone is slender and compact but has internet access. A good phone for the price and I would recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Not unlocked.
Reviews.Author: Scarlett Meszaros
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cell phone and you get what you pay for except even though it was labeled as unlocked, it wasn't. Had to pay 30 bucks to unlock it.

Reviews.Title: Plain & Simple
Reviews.Author: tom martel
Reviews.Content: I needed a plain & simple phone.  This one fits the bill.  I suppose it has capabilities that I do not use (eg. texting, browser, etc.).  I do not have a phone plan that accesses those, nor do I need them.  All I care about is that I can hear the person at the other end of the phone clearly; I can hear my phone ring; I can hear my voicemail messages; and, the person I am talking to can hear me.  This phone satisfies all of those requirements without all the costly frills!  So it is OK for people who do not wish to spend outrageous amounts of money on a phone that they will not use to:  Take pretty pictures; text and drive; use while ignoring life going on around them up close & personal; IMing; GPSing; and whatever else these megabuck mini-communications systems do.If all you want to do is talk & be heard & to hear (NORMAL telephone conversation), then this is the cell phone for you!

Reviews.Title: A simple phone for talk and text
Reviews.Author: Shrikant Swaminathan
Reviews.Content: This is a simple phone to talk and text. It works well. The sound quality is acceptable for the price. It has a micro usb charger  which is the same charger used by most smartphones (android and windows) these days.

Reviews.Title: It's new here June 14th
Reviews.Author: Ms. Grace
Reviews.Content: Great phone, it is new as described...It doesn't have a camera on it, but it's for my mom and dad they are technology challenged, but I love them!!! Anyways, nice, it arrived and required your signature so I appreciate the care and concern for me to receive it as it is for my parents!  Again it arrived, the 14th (I ordered the 10/11th), but got it today, since you had to sign w/ my impatient mail carrier not giving me time to get to the door(LOL) so awesome service I've ordered from the seller before as well and they always give great service...thank you!

Reviews.Title: It's very good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jack Tinder
Reviews.Content: Easy to activate, easy to use simple flip phone. Cheaper and way better than old Sprint Sanyo flip phone it replaced. SIM card readily interchangeable. Battery life is very good. Screen size is small but usable. Keypad is easy to manipulate. Would recommend it if your looking for a good quality inexpensive flip phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: farmer s
Reviews.Content: An easy to use basic phone that works on the 3g network. Voice and text are all that I use a phone for so it works great for me!

Reviews.Title: Basic
Reviews.Author: J. Fischer
Reviews.Content: Its a very basic phone and its what i paid for. Graphics are a little rough and usage is a little difficult.

Reviews.Title: can't use every country
Reviews.Author: ajesh
Reviews.Content: I have ordered an unlocked Samsung Mobile . But it is still locked. I want use that internationally. I buy that mobile to use in india. But it is not unlocked for Indian.

Reviews.Title: For my Mom
Reviews.Author: Charlotte
Reviews.Content: My Mom is travelling overseas and needs a phone to stay in contact.  She also needed a simple phone similar to her regular AT&T; phone; therefore this was a good choice for her to take overseas.  Since it is unlocked she will be able to put the SIM card for that country in the phone and have local number there.

Reviews.Title: I know, I know... "Who would buy a phone like this?"
Reviews.Author: Myshka
Reviews.Content: Well, I had to leave my smartphone at home and start looking for a no-camera phone due to a new job... No camera phones are allowed due to secret nature of the facility and I was not about to be cut off from the world for 9 hours a day. With this, I can get calls and txt, which is the absolute minimum for me. Web and facebook can wait, but I need to touch base with people during the day and be reachable in an emergency situation. This phone took my T-mobile SIM without any problems. With minimum use of some texting and  some phone calls this phone stayed charged for a week. It's a great buy. I wished I could have gotten an old camera-less blackberry but without a blackberry data plan nothing works, etc, hence, this little phone. On weekends, I just slip the same SIM back into my normal phone.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this phone because they lie to much about the phone being unluck
Reviews.Author: michael st martin
Reviews.Content: I would say its a nice good looking phone the only thing about it is that they lie about the phone being unlock that's a lie I buy 2 of the phone thinking it was unlock like they sad and I end up taking the phone to a cell phone shop to be unlock the a the bigs lie

Reviews.Title: Great little phone!
Reviews.Author: Teresa G.
Reviews.Content: Nice little phone. Inserted Family Mobile sim card, and it works like a charm! The battery lasts for days without having to be recharged. I am very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Poorly designed and almost impossible to operate
Reviews.Author: carinskarin
Reviews.Content: It was a cheap piece of junk. I had to buy another phone that my senior father could understand. Don't buy. It's a Kack or Haven knock-off.

Reviews.Title: IT SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Arzu M.
Reviews.Content: My plan for these phones was to take it home to Belize since they were unlocked, but when I get home to Belize, the phones were not actually unlocked. As a matter of fact, I had to pay almost 75% of the purchase price to get it unlocked. Never buy an AT&T; unlocked phones, because they really are not, especially to use overseas, they will let you down. They should refund all my money back because it was misrepresentation. It's stinks.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: Mosh
Reviews.Content: AT&T; refused to activate the phones saying they were stolen from Walmart. Finally had to return the phones, get a refund and order phones elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT !!
Reviews.Author: naoki
Reviews.Content: This is simply what I needed as a cellphone. Very satisfied.  I recommend it to everyone who need an easy phone to operate. THX !!!

Reviews.Title: The phone is LOCKED!!!!
Reviews.Author: samir saadi alyasso
Reviews.Content: The phone was delivered unlocked , but after two days it was LOCKED by AT&T.; NOT a good buy!! I will return the phone .

Reviews.Title: oh nooo
Reviews.Author: Melvin
Reviews.Content: I put the sim card from my phone into this one. It worked but I didn't care for all the navigation I had to go through to make a call, and just to find the apps I wanted. I decided not to keep the phone. I put the sim back into my original phone and found that when I dialed a number, I kept getting the ATT recording, "than you for calling about your ATT CELLUAR SERVICE." I called my carrier and they told me that this phone has been reported as STOLEN.

Reviews.Title: meets expectations
Reviews.Author: MusicTherapist
Reviews.Content: its good for what it is. it is very basic, however- though that was entirely my discretion. I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Only can use with AT&T; SIM card
Reviews.Author: yang
Reviews.Content: This phone cannot use with T-Mobile SIM card ,but it call itself UNLOCK phone,I don't like that.it is aPrepaid phone .

Reviews.Title: Misrepresented
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Samuels
Reviews.Content: This was advertised as unlocked. It is no contract, but locked to AT&T.; Don't trust a seller that doesn't understand the difference.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa F.
Reviews.Content: Phone is good if you just need a phone with none of the bells and whistles...would recommend it to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: Bergie
Reviews.Content: the phone keeps locking by itself after just 2week and now it is not working to make a phone call. This is a terrible item

Reviews.Title: I like this product but the camera was not working
Reviews.Author: Shulthur Vang
Reviews.Content: The camera is not working and how does it work, try and try but did not work so what do you recommend and it's  possible way changed a new one.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Easy-to-use clamshell phone for voice communication and text messaging
3G Data capable
SMS & MMs; Loudspeaker
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung A157 Unlocked GSM Cell Phone with Internet Browser, 3G Capabilities, SMS & MMS and Speakerphone - Black
